pr_title: Updated External Lib Apache Commons Math build process

timeline.message:
Introducing Maven build for apache commons math - (Task #621)

- Added maven based dependency download.
- Added update to license information.
- removed previous jars which were included.

---
Task #621: Update build process for apache math commons external lib.

timeline.bodyText: Same typo as in a previous PR. "Thrid" -> "Third".
